name: Anggy Edo
summary: Experienced Project Manager with a strong background in Informatics Engineering, excelling in roles involving Scrum Mastery, Design Thinking, and Android Development. Adept at leading teams and driving projects to successful completion. Proven track record in data analysis, marketing communication, and cloud engineering. Committed to leveraging expertise to drive organizational success and innovation.

skills.title: Scrum Master
skills.description: Expert in facilitating agile project management methodologies, ensuring timely delivery of projects by coordinating cross-functional teams and removing impediments.

skills.title: Design Thinking
skills.description: Proficient in applying design thinking principles to solve complex problems, enhancing user experience and driving innovative solutions.

skills.title: Android Developer
skills.description: Skilled in developing and maintaining Android applications, with a focus on delivering high-quality, user-centric mobile solutions.

skills.title: Graphic Designer
skills.description: Experienced in creating visually appealing and effective graphic designs, leveraging tools like Adobe Creative Suite to enhance brand identity and communication.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Lead and manage multiple projects, ensuring successful execution and delivery within scope, time, and budget constraints. Coordinate with teams to align project objectives with organizational goals.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Conducted comprehensive data analysis, providing actionable insights to drive research initiatives. Managed large datasets, ensuring data integrity and accuracy in reports.

experience.title: Marketing Communication
experience.description: Develop and execute marketing communication strategies to enhance brand visibility and engagement. Collaborate with creative teams to produce effective marketing materials.
